hero.text1: Take a look at Meowish and choose your purr-fect mischievous partner to become a purr-oud cat purr- son.

features.title: Easy to use.
features.description: So easy to use, even your cat could do it.

features.title: Elite Clientele
features.description: We have all the cats, the greatest dogs.

features.title: Guaranteed to work.
features.description: Find the love of your cat's life or your money back.

testimonials.name: Geet Bhardwaj
testimonials.feedback: I would like to take this opportunity to personally thank you for the positive experience in purchasing a Himalayan kitten. I wanted to buy a kitten and searched a lot online. Your knowledge and understanding of these amazing animals was comforting, in that if I ever had any questions in regards to the breed I would feel confident in your response!!! Thank you, thank you.

testimonials.name: Shamita Pandit
testimonials.feedback: Just an update to let you know how Cordelia is doing. We are amazed at how affectionate she is and the way she always wants to be with you. My two other cats are warming up to her, and even run around and play with her on occasion.

testimonials.name: Rakhi Kumar
testimonials.feedback: We want to thank Mycatshop so so much for shipping our kittens safely to our home. Both are enjoying their new environment.
